name: operatorDeletedById
description: Subscription for a specific operator was removed from the system event
deprecationReason: operatorDeletedById has been removed, no value will be sent.

fields.name: external_id
fields.description: External ID of an operator provided by the operator data source

fields.name: logo
fields.description: Image link to an operator’s logo

children.name: url
children.description: URL from where the image data can be fetched through a web browser.

children.name: thumbnail
children.description: URL from where a thumbnail of the image can be fetched through a webbrowser.

children.name: CHARGER
children.description: Photo of the physical device that contains one or more EVSEs.

children.name: ENTRANCE
children.description: Location entrance photo. Should show the car entrance to the location from street side.

children.name: NETWORK
children.description: Logo of an associated roaming network to be displayed with the EVSE for example in lists, maps and detailed information views.

children.name: OPERATOR
children.description: Logo of the charge point operator, for example a municipality, to be displayed in the EVSEs detailed information view or in lists and maps, if no network logo is present.

children.name: OWNER
children.description: Logo of the charge point owner, for example a local store, to be displayed in the EVSEs detailed information view.

children.name: type
children.description: Image type: gif, jpeg, png, svg

children.name: width
children.description: Width of the full scale image

children.name: height
children.description: Height of the full scale image

children.name: phone
children.description: The phone number in international format

children.name: website
children.description: The absolute URL of the website

children.name: facebook
children.description: The absolute URL of the facebook profile page

children.name: twitter
children.description: The absolute URL of the twitter profile page

children.name: properties
children.description: Optional object where you can store custom data you need in your application. This extends the current functionalities we offer
